issue.title: [C++] Define and document naming convention for internal / private header files not to be installed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4029](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4029). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The purpose of this is so that a common `ARROW_INSTALL_PUBLIC_HEADERS` can recognize and exclude any file that is non-public from installation.

see discussion on https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3172
